mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID customerID, CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, PASSWORD, SSN, PHOTO, PHONE, CITY, ADDRESS, POSTALCODE FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerID} AND PASSWORD LIKE #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMERS SET PASSWORD =#{password},PHONE=#{phone},CITY=#{city},ADDRESS=#{address},POSTALCODE=#{postalCode} WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerID}
